thread.section_title: busuu Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of busuu | www.busuu.com | 2 of 240
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
So far - I am most impressed with the level of experience. I am confidant that this program is going to make me fluent in french, finally. I do have experience, but as you probably know- After a good start you kinda usually fall of the wagon and your ambitions gets lost....! But, with this app you are on the right track, -- gotta stay on it, -- even if it's just on your lunch beaks, but the results will surprise you.
You are going to make progress!!
Testing yourself and getting corrections from fellow learners is a huge help. Everyday people like you and me.
